title: Set up Angular frontend with Tailwind CSS
description: Initialize Angular 21 project with standalone components, configure Tailwind CSS for modern styling, and set up project structure

title: Implement .NET backend with REST API
description: Create ASP.NET Core minimal API with CRUD endpoints for todos, configure CORS, and set up Swagger documentation

title: Connect backend to Azure Cosmos DB
description: Set up Cosmos DB repository pattern, implement automated database/container provisioning, and configure connection strings

title: Build todo list UI components
description: Create reusable Angular components: todo list, todo item, todo form, filters, and stats display with responsive design

title: Implement state management with Angular signals
description: Create TodoStore service using Angular signals for reactive state management, computed values for filtering and statistics

title: Add todo filtering and search functionality
description: Implement filters for status (all/active/completed), priority, starred items, and search by title/description

title: Implement priority and starred features
description: Add priority levels (HIGH, MEDIUM, LOW) and starred functionality to todos with visual indicators in the UI

title: Add error handling and loading states
description: Implement error banners, loading overlays, toast notifications, and proper error handling throughout the application

title: Configure environment variables and build setup
description: Set up @ngx-env/builder for frontend environment variables, configure build scripts for different environments

title: Write comprehensive README documentation
description: Document setup instructions, environment variables, API endpoints, and how to run both frontend and backend locally

title: Deploy backend to Azure App Service
description: Configure Azure App Service deployment, set up production environment variables, and verify Cosmos DB connection

title: Add user management system
description: Implement user registration, login, and profile management. Create user model, authentication endpoints, and user-specific todo filtering

title: Implement authentication and authorization
description: Add JWT-based authentication, secure API endpoints with authorization policies, and implement protected routes in frontend
